title: 020 Show and Hide FloatingActionButton on Swipe
To show and hide a
FloatingActionButton
c
with the default animation, just call the methods
show()
c
and
hide()
c
. It’s good practice to keep a
FloatingActionButton
c
in the Activity layout instead of putting it in a Fragment, this allows the default animations to work when showing and hiding.
